name: Office Scene
description:
Click "Run Game" to start the experience.

Due to the size of the file, opening this game may take a minute or two.

This game is a virtual experience of a generic office created using the Unity engine.

The cursor controls your players head movement.

A (Left), S (Down), D (Right), and W (Up) control player movement.

Click anywhere on the screen to lock your cursor to the page.

When done click "Escape" to unlock cursor.
